text:
[Verse]
Dancing through the twilight glow
Shadows whisper soft and slow
Beneath a sky of diamond light
We lose ourselves in the night

[Verse 2]
Stars are singing lullabies
Silent echoes in our eyes
A gentle breeze begins to play
Guiding us through night and day

[Chorus]
Underneath the moon's embrace
In this magic
Find our place
Every heartbeat
Every sigh
Glowing bright in the midnight sky

[Verse 3]
Waves are crashing soft and cool
Nature's symphony
The rule
Holding you close in moon’s caress
In this moment
Nothing less

[Bridge]
Silver light
We’re intertwined
In this space
Love undefined
Floating free with hearts alight
In the dance of endless night

[Chorus]
Underneath the moon's embrace
In this magic
Find our place
Every heartbeat
Every sigh
Glowing bright in the midnight sky
title: Moonlit Serenade
